# PACKAGE "EPICONCEPTS"

```{r}
library(Epiconcepts)
ec.use("Tiramitsu", extension="df");

```

### fonction ec.freq()

SYNTAXE :

  ec.freq(x [, by=y][, where=condition])

EXEMPLE :

```{r results="asis"}
ec.freq("ill");
ec.freq("ill", by="sex");
```

Il est possible de tracer un histogramme de la fr√©quence.

```{r results='asis'}
res <- ec.freq("ill");
ec.plot(res);
ec.plot(ec.freq("ill", by="sex"));

tab = table(GDS$ill, GDS$sex)
print(xtable(tab), type="html")

```
